title: Koepka leaving LIV Golf, cites family reasons
content: Five-time major champion Brooks Koepka is stepping away from LIV Golf, effective immediately, his representatives said Tuesday.

title: Jokic: Flagg 'really mature' in leading Mavs to win
content: Cooper Flagg had the best long-range shooting performance of his young career and left an impression on three-time MVP Nikola Jokic with his performance down the stretch Tuesday night.

title: Spurs' defense throttles OKC as rivalry grows
content: The Spurs beat the Thunder for the second time in 10 days after again overwhelming the defending champions with physicality and speed.

title: Gamecocks LB to be among highest-paid in 2026
content: Star edge rusher Dylan Stewart will be among the country's highest-paid players when he returns to South Carolina, sources told ESPN.

title: Lakers' Redick blunt: Effort, defense 'a choice'
content: Los Angeles' defense was shredded in the third quarter of a 132-108 loss to Phoenix on Tuesday night.

title: Perryman loses appeal, to miss Chargers' final 2
content: Denzel Perryman's two-game suspension for "repeated violations of playing rules intended to protect the health and safety of players" was upheld by hearing officer Jordy Nelson on Tuesday.

title: Nuggets forward Johnson to have MRI on knee
content: Nuggets forward Cameron Johnson is set to undergo an MRI on his right knee after suffering what the Nuggets called a sprain in Tuesday's loss in Dallas.

title: üíì Venus Williams, Andrea Preti tie the knot
content: Williams and Preti became wife and husband over the weekend in Palm Beach, Florida, as part of a five-day celebration.

content: With NBA Christmas games on the horizon, stars and coaches share their stories and gripes about playing on the holiday.

content: Here are the 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, as ranked by an expert panel of coaches, GMs and journalists.

content: Christmas Day includes three NFL matchups and five NBA games. We're previewing them all with picks, predictions, storylines and more.

content: The success and virality of this duo is doing more than quiet the typical noise around the Lakers. It also might transition the franchise fully into their post-LeBron era.

content: From ROY and MIP races, our NBA insiders break down all 30 teams' young riser in this week's Power Rankings.

content: The Huskies return to the top line as Duke drops to a 2-seed after suffering its first loss of the season.

title: Power Rankings: Should UConn or Texas be No. 1?
content: Texas has the best two-way point guard in the game. UConn might have the two best players in the nation.

title: Bracketology: Louisville up, Tennessee down as host battle heats up
content: A decisive win over Tennessee put Louisville solidly inside the top 16 -- and dropped the Lady Vols to a 6-seed.

title: A miracle child, a priceless penny and a racing legend
content: Back in 1998, long before the United States stopped producing the penny, a little girl with spina bifida gave Dale Earnhardt a gift that raises the question: What if pennies are actually worth everything?

title: NFL Week 17 buzz: What we're hearing on Joe Burrow, the red-hot Jaguars and Pro Bowl rosters
content: Here's the latest heading into NFL Week 17, including intel on Joe Burrow's future, opening QB1 spots, the Jaguars' legitimacy and Pro Bowl roster fallout.

title: Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus each team's rookie of the year
content: There was plenty of movement after a wild Week 16. We also looked at the best rookies from all 32 teams.

content: We are following the 2025 NFL season's playoff picture. Here's how things look right now for wild-card spots, division races and even the draft order.

content: His decision to play for Syracuse felt like a coronation. Now, he's out to prove he's more than Carmelo's son.

title: A 12-player blockbuster? Cy Young signings? Ranking the biggest MLB Christmas week moves
content: Who says the baseball offseason slows down for the holidays? Let's remember some free agent signings and trades.

content: Who has reason for jeer this holiday season? We break down which teams' fans have the most reasons to be mad.

content: From signature holes to a bigger and better putting green, the TGL is ready for the start of the 2026 season.

content: How and when would the WNBPA executive committee vote to strike? What would that entail? What benefits would be lost?

title: Look out, Arsenal: Man City titles have been built on dominant midseason runs
content: Man City haven't been their typical best this season -- at least not yet, though the festive period is when their title wins have been built. Should Arsenal be worried?

title: World Junior Championship guide: Top contenders, key players to watch
content: The tournament starts Thursday, with the best under-20 players in hockey. Here are gold medal favorites, players set to break out.

title: The NHL's best this week: Is Craig Berube on the hot seat in Toronto?
content: As the holiday break approaches, the Maple Leafs aren't exactly excelling. Plus, key games in the week ahead.

title: Matchup rankings: Upgrade Harold Fannin Jr., downgrade Jameson Williams
content: The most and least favorable matchups in the NFL for this week's games at the four key fantasy positions (QB, RB, WR and TE).

title: Buzz: Disappointing Chiefs enter Christmas matchup as two-TD underdogs to Broncos
content: The NFL's Christmas Day slate features some disappointing teams, none as bad betting-wise as the Kansas City Chiefs.

title: NBA betting: Two ways to get more value betting on the Thunder this season
content: Andre Snellings looks at the creative ways to bet the NBA's best team this season and still get value.

title: The Wet Bandits: Lauri Markkanen, Jazz VP dress as 'Home Alone' duo
content: The Utah Jazz star appropriately took the role of Marv Murchins, while Evan Phillips dressed as Harry Lyme.

title: BlueBird Block-2 mission: Isro shares unique view of Baahubali's liftoff ‚Äî watch
content: ISRO's LVM3-M6 rocket successfully launched the BlueBird Block-2 satellite for AST SpaceMobile, offering a unique onboard camera perspective of the entire mission. The footage captured liftoff, booster separation, and satellite deployment into Low Earth Orbit, marking a significant commercial success for ISRO's heavy-lift vehicle.

title: No more lottery: How new H-1B visa selection system will work ‚Äî key changes explained
content: After President Donald Trump proposed a $100,000 entry fee for new H-1B visa applications, the US Department of Homeland Security announced a major overhaul of the H-1B visa selection process. The department said that the long-standing random lottery system will be replaced with a wage-weighted model that prioritises higher-paid and higher-skilled applicants.

title: 'Arunachal now China's core interest': US flags Beijing's 'rejuvenation' plan; what is it
content: A Pentagon report reveals China's inclusion of Arunachal Pradesh among its core interests, alongside Taiwan and maritime disputes, as part of its national rejuvenation goals. The report also details deepening China-Pakistan military and strategic ties, including arms co-production and potential logistics facilities, while noting China's sensitivity to perceived threats to CCP legitimacy.

title: ‚ÄòWe don‚Äôt want you in America‚Äô: US bans EU officials; here's why
content: The US has banned five prominent Europeans from entering the country, accusing them of pushing online censorship against American viewpoints. Secretary of State Marco Rubio cited efforts to suppress free speech and target American companies, particularly concerning the EU's Digital Services Act. This move signals a strong 'America First' stance against perceived foreign overreach.

title: VHT: Virat Kohli surpasses Sachin Tendulkar; saves Delhi with 131 knock
content: India's batting stalwart Virat Kohli starred with a brilliant 131 as Delhi chased down 299 to beat Andhra by four wickets in their Vijay Hazare Trophy opener in Bengaluru. Ricky Bhui‚Äôs 122 powered Andhra to 298/8, but strong support from Priyansh Arya and Nitish Rana helped Delhi seal victory in 37.4 overs.

title: 'His bail like kaal for us': Unnao rape survivor to move SC; uproar over relief for Sengar
content: The Unnao rape survivor expressed deep distress over Kuldeep Singh Sengar's bail, calling it 'death' for her family and vowing to challenge the Delhi High Court's decision in the Supreme Court. The court suspended Sengar's life sentence, citing he shouldn't be jailed solely on victim threat perception, while imposing strict bail conditions.

title: Taylor Swift opens up about cancer scare and Travis Kelce‚Äôs support
content: Taylor Swift opened up about a painful chapter during the Eras Tour, revealing how a backup singer‚Äôs cancer diagnosis deeply shook her tour family. The experience marked an emotional low point, but Swift said she later found renewed joy and stability in her personal life, crediting Travis Kelce with bringing light and happiness after an incredibly difficult period.

title: Salesforce reboots AI strategy: Model errors raise concerns
content: Salesforce is scaling back its reliance on large language models due to reliability issues, shifting focus to deterministic automation in its Agentforce product. Executives acknowledge a decline in trust in AI models, with reported instances of models omitting instructions and losing focus. This strategic pivot follows significant support staff reductions attributed to AI agent deployment.

title: Tracked, shot 4 bullets: How Bengaluru techie gunned down his wife; here's what happened
content: A software professional allegedly shot his estranged wife dead on a busy Bengaluru road during rush hour following prolonged marital discord. The accused surrendered to the police with the pistol. The victim had sought legal separation, which the accused reportedly refused, leading to the fatal incident.

title: Magnesium and dementia risk: What happens to your brain when you take magnesium daily
content: New research suggests that increasing magnesium intake could significantly benefit brain health and potentially lower dementia risk. Studies indicate higher magnesium levels are linked to larger brain volume and fewer lesions, suggesting a younger-looking brain. Incorporating magnesium-rich foods like leafy greens, nuts, and seeds is recommended for optimal cognitive function as we age.

title: Elon Musk vs Andrej Karpathy: Tesla CEO pushes back on Waymo comparison
content: Elon Musk criticized former AI chief Andrej Karpathy's views on Tesla's FSD, calling them outdated. Karpathy had previously compared Tesla's software-centric approach to Waymo's modular system, suggesting Tesla's end-to-end neural network would ultimately prevail. Musk asserts Tesla's AI intelligence density has significantly improved since Karpathy's departure.

title: VHT: Fastest ever century! Rohit Sharma lights up Mumbai opener
content: India's batting stalwart Rohit Sharma smashed a brilliant 155 off 94 balls as Mumbai thrashed Sikkim by eight wickets in their Vijay Hazare Trophy opener in Jaipur. Sikkim posted 236/7, led by Ashish Thapa‚Äôs 79. Mumbai chased the target in just 30.3 overs, with Rohit dominating the contest. They will be confident going into the next matches.

title: Mumbai shocker: 85-year-old loses Rs 9cr in ‚Äòdigital arrest‚Äô; how police cracked case
content: Mumbai cyber police arrested a 27-year-old company director in connection with a Rs 9 crore digital arrest scam targeting an 85-year-old retired teacher. The accused's company account received a portion of the victim's funds, which was also linked to other senior citizen fraud cases totaling Rs 5.65 crore.

title: Masashi 'Jumbo' Ozaki: Legendary Japanese golf star dies at 78
content: Japanese golf legend Masashi ‚ÄúJumbo‚Äù Ozaki has died at 78 after a battle with sigmoid colon cancer. A national icon, Ozaki won 113 tournaments worldwide and inspired a generation of golfers, becoming the first Japanese player to finish in the Masters top 10. His unparalleled career achievements remain unmatched in Japan.

title: Paul Rudd reacts to Travis Kelce‚Äôs apology after Chiefs‚Äô playoff exit
content: Actor Paul Rudd shared his perspective on the Kansas City Chiefs' season. He highlighted the joy and memories the team has provided his family. Rudd embraced the team's elimination from playoff contention. He wished Patrick Mahomes a speedy recovery. Rudd also humorously suggested players deserved a break after a long season. He stated he was not too upset.

title: Who is Brittani? Inside Aaron Rodgers‚Äô wife as marriage mystery deepens
content: Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has found unexpected peace in his marriage to Brittani.  Unlike his previous public relationships, Brittani values privacy.  Rodgers credits his wife with providing unconditional love and stability.  This new chapter sees a calmer, more focused Rodgers as he navigates his final NFL years.  His teammates and coaches notice the positive change.

title: Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola‚Äôs combined net worth in 2025
content: Shane and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon possess a combined net worth of $650 million, largely attributed to Shane's decades with WWE and his diversified business ventures. While Shane's wealth stems from his executive roles, on-camera presence, and equity in WWE, Marissa's career in film production and PR augments their family fortune.

title: 'Lower tax on air purifiers': HC asks GST Council to hold meet; Delhi's toxic air in focus
content: The Delhi High Court has urged the GST Council to hold a meeting to consider reducing the 18% GST on air purifiers due to severe air pollution. The court was hearing a plea seeking to declare air purifiers as ‚Äúmedical devices‚Äù and exempt them from GST, the court said air purifiers could not be treated as luxury items in a city battling extreme air pollution.

title: Ashes: No Archer and Pope! England make changes to XI for 4th Test
content: England have made key changes for the Boxing Day Ashes Test against Australia. Jofra Archer is ruled out for the rest of the series with a side strain, replaced by Gus Atkinson. Ollie Pope has been dropped for Jacob Bethell. Despite being 3-0 down, England hope the changes spark a turnaround in Melbourne.

title: 5 reasons why your digestion gets worse in the winters
content: Winter's chill and shorter days quietly slow your digestion.  Cold temperatures, reduced activity, and richer foods make your gut work harder and slower.  Lower water intake and disrupted sleep further complicate things.  Understanding these seasonal shifts can help you support your digestive system through the colder months with simple adjustments.

title: Odisha shocker: Minor girl ‚Äòraped and murdered‚Äô; body found in jungle
content: A 10-year-old girl was found dead in a jungle in Bhadrak district. She had gone to school and did not return home. Family members found her body and filed a police complaint. Police are investigating the case as assault and murder. Angry locals blocked the highway demanding justice for the victim.

title: CAT 2025 result released at iimcat.ac.in: Direct link to download scorecards here
content: The Indian Institute of Management has released the CAT 2025 result on iimcat.ac.in, ending weeks of anticipation for MBA aspirants. The scorecards display scaled scores and normalised percentiles across exam slots. These results will guide shortlisting for WAT, GD, and PI rounds conducted by IIMs and other management institutes. Candidates must check the direct link provided here to download the CAT result 2025.

title: Delhi Metro expansion: Cabinet clears Phase-VA - all you need to know
content: The Union Cabinet has greenlit Delhi Metro's Phase-VA, adding 13 new stations and over 16 km to the network, extending it beyond 400 km. This Rs 12,015 crore expansion aims to boost connectivity in Central Delhi and the airport area, reduce traffic, and cut pollution. The project is slated for completion within three years.

title: 'Two days in Delhi, I get infection‚Äô: Gadkari flags severity of air pollution; highlights fossil fuel use
content: Union minister Nitin Gadkari highlighted Delhi's severe air pollution, attributing 40% to the transport sector's reliance on fossil fuels. He urged a shift to electric and hydrogen mobility, framing it as a nationalistic imperative to reduce costly imports and pollution. Gadkari emphasised India's potential for cleaner fuel alternatives and advancements in electric vehicle technology.

title: Vinod Kumar Shukla, first Jnanpith awardee from Chhattisgarh, dies at 88
content: Renowned Hindi writer Vinod Kumar Shukla passed away at 88 after a lung ailment. The first Jnanpith awardee from Chhattisgarh, Shukla was known for his quiet grace and focus on ordinary people's inner worlds. He continued writing even in the ICU, leaving behind a legacy of profound literature.

title: 'Kicked her in stomach': Man assaults pregnant woman while celebrating Jagan Reddy's birthday
content: A man in Sri Sathya Sai district was arrested and paraded for allegedly assaulting a six-month pregnant woman. The incident occurred when the woman objected to loud cracker bursting during a birthday celebration. Police have registered a case and emphasized strict action against crimes targeting women and children.

title: Vince & Linda McMahon net worth in 2025: WWE earnings, careers and investments
content: Wrestling titans Vince and Linda McMahon boast a $3.2 billion net worth in 2025, largely from their WWE empire and TKO Group Holdings shares. Vince's legacy in transforming wrestling is undeniable, while Linda also carved a significant business and political path. Despite recent legal challenges for Vince, their financial success endures.

title: Unnao rape survivor‚Äôs mother blocked from protest; claims daughter is 'held captive'
content: Security personnel in Delhi reportedly stopped an Unnao rape survivor and her mother from protesting at India Gate. The duo were demonstrating against the Delhi High Court's decision to grant relief to former BJP MLA Kuldeep Singh Sengar. The victim's mother expressed distress, stating they were not granted justice and feared for their safety.

title: Venus Williams‚Äô love story: Who is her husband Andrea Preti and why the couple had two weddings
content: Tennis star Venus Williams and her husband Andrea Preti celebrated two weddings in 2025. After an initial ceremony in Italy in September, the couple exchanged vows again in a lavish five-day event in Palm Beach, Florida, in December.  The second wedding was necessitated by international registration delays and honored Venus's Florida heritage.

title: 'Won't bow down': Thackeray cousins reunite after 20yrs for BMC polls; present united front
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) and MNS have announced an alliance for upcoming BMC and other civic body elections, marking a political reunion of Thackeray cousins Uddhav and Raj. Seat-sharing agreements have been finalized, with the NCP (SP) also included in some discussions. This move is seen as a significant development in Maharashtra politics.

title: World record in Ranchi! Bihar smash highest-ever List A total; Sakibul Gani hits fastest 100
content: Bihar shattered List A cricket history, posting a world-record 574/6 against Arunachal Pradesh. Captain Sakibul Gani hit the fastest Indian List A century (32 balls), while 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi smashed 190 off 84 balls, becoming the youngest List A centurion ever. Ayush Loharuka also contributed a century in the dominant batting display.

title: VHT: 16,000 and counting! Virat Kohli enters elite List A club with Sachin Tendulkar
content: Virat Kohli achieved a significant milestone, becoming the second Indian after Sachin Tendulkar to surpass 16,000 List A runs during the Vijay Hazare Trophy. His return to domestic cricket also serves as crucial preparation for India's upcoming ODI series against New Zealand.

title: Moscow car blast: Two police officers, one civilian killed; Russia blames Ukraine
content: Moscow was rocked by a deadly explosion Wednesday, claiming the lives of two police officers and a bystander. The blast occurred as officers approached a suspicious individual. This incident follows a similar car bomb attack on a senior Russian military officer earlier this week in the same district, raising security alarms in the capital.

title: Crackdown on corruption: Telangana official arrested with Rs 12 cr disproportionate assets
content: A deputy transport commissioner in Mahabubnagar, identified as Kishan, has been arrested by the ACB for amassing assets worth an estimated ‚Çπ12 crore, significantly exceeding his known income. His extensive holdings include hotel shares, commercial and agricultural land, flats, bank deposits, and gold. Investigations are ongoing to ascertain the full extent of his wealth.

title: 'Wanted to kill myself': Unnao rape survivor protests Kuldeep Sengar bail; calls it 'injustice'
content: Unnao rape survivor protested at India Gate after Kuldeep Singh Sengar's bail, fearing for her safety and alleging political motives linked to upcoming elections. She expressed betrayal by the system but retained faith in the Supreme Court. Sengar's bail was suspended pending appeal, though he remains in custody due to a separate conviction.

title: 'You had Osman Hadi killed': Kin makes big claim against Yunus; alleges plot to 'sabotage' polls
content: The brother of slain youth leader Sharif Osman Hadi accused Bangladesh‚Äôs interim government of orchestrating his killing to destabilise the country and sabotage the February elections. Speaking at protests in Dhaka, he said Hadi was targeted for supporting timely polls and refusing outside pressure, warning of continued agitation unless swift justice is delivered.

title: VHT: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi becomes youngest centurion; smashes 36-ball hundred
content: Fourteen-year-old Vaibhav Sooryavanshi has electrified the Vijay Hazare Trophy, smashing a 36-ball century against Arunachal Pradesh on Wednesday. This remarkable feat makes him the youngest List-A centurion ever.  The young prodigy's explosive batting, including a conversion to 150 in 59 balls, signals a potential shift in Indian domestic cricket's landscape.

title: 'Dhurandhar' box office day 20: Ranveer Singh starrer expected to touch Rs 600 cr
content: Dhurandhar is enjoying a phenomenal box office run. The film has broken records and is set to become the highest-grossing Hindi film. It is expected to cross Rs 600 crore by the end of its third week. With few major releases, Dhurandhar is well-placed for a sustained theatrical run. It is on course to overtake Pushpa 2's collection.

title: Indian woman murdered in Toronto: Suspect identified, image released; what we know so far
content: Toronto police are searching for Abdul Ghafoori, the main suspect in the murder of 30-year-old Indian national Himanshi Khurana. Her body was discovered in a residence near Strachan Avenue and Wellington Street West. Authorities are treating the incident as intimate partner violence, and a Canada-wide warrant has been issued for Ghafoori's arrest.

title: ‚ÄòGroped, slapped, stalked‚Äô: Man assaults woman after she rejects his proposal; CCTV captures attack
content: A 21-year-old woman was stalked and assaulted by a man she met on Instagram in Bengaluru. The accused, Naveen Kumar, allegedly harassed her after she rejected his advances. He intercepted her and attacked her, leading to his arrest by Jnanabharathi police.

title: Exclusive | Naseem Shah on criticism: 'Fans have never held a ball... you don't take it to heart'
content: Pakistan fast bowler Naseem Shah reflects on the challenges of T20 cricket, his journey through injuries and scrutiny, and his current positive outlook with the Desert Vipers in the ILT20. He emphasises on continuous learning, mental resilience against criticism, and the unique difficulties faced by bowlers in a batter-dominated era.

title: Unnao Rape Survivor Visits Rahul Gandhi, Says "Want To Meet PM Too"
content: The survivor in the Unnao rape case and her mother met Congress's Rahul Gandhi this evening, hours after the elder woman was manhandled by the Central paramilitary personnel.

title: Strict Pollution Curbs Under GRAP-4 Lifted In Delhi As Air Quality Improves
content: Delhi has removed GRAP-4 conditions on controlling air pollution a week after imposing it due to the worsening situation

title: A Nitin Gadkari-Ismail Haniyeh Meet Hours Before Shocking Assassination
content: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari has recounted a sequence of events that placed him in close proximity to one of the Middle East's most high-profile assassinations in recent years -- the killing of Hamas political chief Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran.

title: Students Engage In Obscene Acts On Train, Driver Films Them. All 3 Charged
content: An FIR has been registered against three persons after an obscene video of two students inside the premium coach of a Namo Bharat train surfaced on social media, police said on Wednesday.

title: On Camera, Lord Vishnu Statue Destroyed In Cambodia, Allegedly By Thailand
content: As the conflict between Thailand and Cambodia drags on, a Cambodian official has accused Bangkok of destroying a statue of Lord Vishnu in a disputed border area.

title: Note Saying 'Trump Loves Young Girls' Is Fake: US Department Of Justice
content: The Department of Justice on Tuesday said that the handwritten letter by Jeffrey Epstein, addressed to convicted sex offender Larry Nassar, that was released as a part of the Epstein files, is "fake".

title: Video: Moment Cheap Ukrainian 'STING' Outsmarted A Russian Jet-Powered Shahed Drone
content: A video posted online captures the moment a small, fast-moving Ukrainian interceptor drone closes in on -- and destroys -- a Russian jet-powered Shahed suicide drone at altitude.

title: 15 Babies Sold For 15 Lakhs Each: Infant Selling Racket Busted In Telangana
content: The Cyberabad Special Operations Team in Telangana has dismantled a sophisticated interstate syndicate that was buying and selling infants across states for lakhs of rupees.

title: Adani Power Raises Long-Term Capacity Target To 41.87 Gigawatt By FY32
content: Adani Power Ltd has raised its long-term installed capacity target to 41.87 gigawatt by FY32 and committed capital expenditure of about Rs 2 lakh crore.

title: How 85-Year-Old Man Lost Rs 9 Crore In 'Digital Arrest' In Mumbai
content: A major cyber fraud has been reported from Mumbai, where an 85-year-old man from Mumbai's Thakurdwar area was cheated of nearly Rs 9 crore by fraudsters posing as police officers.

title: Gujarat Man Blocks Road To Burst Firecrackers, Says "I Am A Celebrity"
content: Vehicles helplessly waited and onlookers walked by with caution as a Surat businessman blocked a road to light fireworks to celebrate his son's birthday.

title: -30 Degrees, Low Oxygen Levels: How Army Survives In Himalayas During Winter
content: The weather in the remote snow-capped Himalayas has deteriorated significantly these days. Temperatures in Ladakh, Kargil, Galwan, North Sikkim, the Shamshabari Range, and the Greater Himalayan region have plummeted to several degrees below zero.

title: Shocking Scenes As Men From Central Force Manhandle Unnao Survivor's Mother
content: Shocking scenes played out on the roads of the national capital as paramilitary personnel blocked the Unnao rape survivor and her mother from addressing the media and also forced the elderly mother to jump off a moving bus

title: Delhi To Get 3 More Metro Corridors, Including Central Vista Extension
content: The Union cabinet has approved three new metro corridors of a total length of 16 km under the Delhi Metro Phase 5(A). These are RK Ashram Marg to Indraprastha (9 km), Aerocity to IGD Airport T-1 (2 km), and Tughlakabad to Kalindi Kunj (3.9 km).

title: "Alliance For Survival": D Fadnavis, E Shinde Dismiss Thackeray Reunion
content: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis dismissed the alliance between the Thackeray brothers, saying it was politics of opportunism that landed them there and it would not make any difference to Mumbai.

title: Rahul Gandhi's "Dead Society" Remark After Unnao Rape Survivor's Mother Manhandled
content: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi on Wednesday launched an attack on the Centre after disturbing scenes emerged from Delhi involving the Unnao rape survivor and her elderly mother.

title: Zelensky Reveals New 20-Point US-Led Plan To End Russia-Ukraine War
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has revealed details of the latest US-led plan to end the war in Ukraine, saying it had been agreed between negotiators from Kyiv and Washington and sent to Moscow for feedback.

title: "State That Has No Shame": Indian Student Roasts Pakistan At Oxford Debate
content: Viraansh Bhanushali, a Mumbai-born law student at Oxford University, has recently gone viral for his hard-hitting address at a high-profile debate on India-Pakistan relations at Britain's prestigious Oxford Union.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Bangladesh: A Lynching, Nationalism, And Blood Sacrifice
content: For the present idea of Bangladeshi nationalism, a Hindu factory worker claiming that God is one and the same for everyone, despite different names, is an inconvenience. It hasn't been a new inconvenience, though.

title: 5 Boys, 1 Bike, Rs 31,000 Fine: Viral Video Shows Dangerous Stunt In UP
content: The video caught the attention of local authorities. The Police from Pilkhuwa Kotwali filed a traffic violation case and issued a fine of Rs 31,000 for the reckless ride.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal, Chelsea eye January move for Marseille's Bakola
content: Marseille midfielder Darryl Bakola is attracting interest from Premier League rivals Arsenal and Chelsea. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: No one likes Gunther, Austin Theory joins The Vision
content: WWE fans already were out on Gunther for retiring John Cena. Now it's clear his fellow wrestlers are, too.

title: Karnataka government stands by Belagavi DC, says Satish Jarkiholi
content: Defending the decision to issue prohibitory orders against Maharashtra MP Dhairyasheel Mane, the Minister said that Belagavi Deputy Commissioner Mohammad Roshan wanted to avoid law and order problems during the Black Day observation by Maharashtra Ekikaran Samithi

title: 'Sanatan Dharma' not safe in West Bengal, alleges Suvendu
content: Suvendu Adhikari asked the police to mend their ways or face "consequences" after April, when the assembly elections would be due in the State

title: After IndiGo crisis, aviation ministry gives nod to two new Indian airlines
content: AI Hind Air aims to begin operations in southern India with a fleet of ATR Turboprop ‚Å†aircraft, while Fly Express website says "coming soon‚Äù

title: Stress tests and drones: the new playbook to protect the endangered western hoolock gibbon
content: Over the last 50 years, the gibbon population has plummeted from over an estimated 100,000 individuals to less than 5,000

title: Maharashtra poll results 2025: BJP gains, Sena & NCP factions struggle | Full breakdown
content:
In this episode of Pulse Maharashtra, we break down the major takeaways from the recently held municipal council and Nagar Panchayat elections across the state. The video explores how these polls unfolded after a long gap, why they were considered a crucial test for Maharashtra‚Äôs key political parties, and what the results reveal about shifting dynamics on the ground.

We look at the performance of the BJP, the challenges faced within the Mahayuti alliance, the impact of the Shiv Sena and NCP splits, and the emerging trends in regions like Vidarbha, Konkan, and the Mumbai Metropolitan area. The episode also highlights how different parties approached the campaign, the internal tensions that surfaced, and what these outcomes could signal as Maharashtra prepares for the upcoming municipal corporation elections, including the high‚Äëstakes battle for Mumbai.

Video and presentation: Vinaya Deshpande
Editing: Tayyab Hussain S M

title: SIT moves closer to questioning more TDB higher-ups in Sabarimala gold theft case
content: Notably, two TDB officials who were in charge in 2019, K.P. Sankar Das and N. Vijaykumar, have moved the Enquiry Commissioner and Special Judge, Vigilance, Kollam, for protection from arrest. Officials said the SIT had not named any 2019 TDB member as an accused in the case

title: Red Fort blast: Delhi court extends judicial custody of 7 accused till January 8
content: The court remanded Adeel Rather, Muzammil Ganaie, Shaheen Saeed, Maulvi Irfan Ahmed Wagay, Jasir Bilal Wani, Amir Rashid Ali and Soyab in judicial custody for 15 more days

title: Humayun Kabir names ex-policeman Abul Hasan as JUP  candidate from Bengal‚Äôs Ballygunge after dropping Nisha Chatterjee
content: JUP founder said Nisha Chatterjee was dropped because her social media presence did not align with his party's image;  Abul Hasan is his mother's first cousin

title: Alliance of Thackerays won't have much impact: Maharashtra CM Devendra Fadnavis
content: Talking to reporters in Mumbai after the announcement, CM Devendra Fadnavis said, "Their track record is of corruption and self-interest‚Äù

title: Delhi Police arrests alleged kingpin of organised crime syndicate under MCOCA
content: The police said the syndicate operated for pecuniary gain, using violence, coercion and intimidation to commit crimes and extort property, creating fear among residents in several parts of the city

title: China probably seeks to capitalise on decreased tension along LAC to stabilise ties with India: U.S. report
content: ‚ÄúIndia probably remains sceptical of China‚Äôs actions and motives. Continued mutual distrust and other irritants almost certainly limit the bilateral relationship,‚Äù the report added

title: Himachal Pradesh custodial death case: HC suspends jail term of former IGP Zaidi
content: The case pertains to the custodial death of Suraj, an accused in the 2017 Kotkhai gang rape and murder case, in which former Himachal Pradesh IGP Zahur Haider Zaidi was sentenced to life imprisonment.

title: Malayalam filmmaker Anuraj Manohar challenges  Kerala Film Producers‚Äô Association‚Äôs list of hits and flop films in 2025, questions criteria
content: According to the list, only eight of the more than 180 films released so far in 2025 were classified as ‚Äòsuper hits,‚Äô with the estimated total loss pegged at around ‚Çπ360 crore. Manohar is the director of Malayalam political thriller Narivetta released earlier this year

title: Eminent writer Vinod Kumar Shukla‚Äôs last rites performed with full state honours in Raipur
content: Chief Minister Vishnu Deo Sai visited the residence of the late litterateur at Shailendra Nagar in Raipur and expressed his condolences to the bereaved family

title: Three of family killed, two injured in road accident near Ballari
content: Three members of a family were killed and two others seriously injured when their car overturned on the Ballari-Siruguppa State Highway near Devinagar Camp in Siruguppa taluk in Ballari district

title: Union Cabinet approves expansion of Delhi Metro Rail network
content: With phase 5-A, Delhi Metro will cross 400 kilometres and will be among the top five in the world, catering to over 65 lakh commuters every day

title: Two killed, one injured as spark from motor triggers major factory fire in Chhattisgarh‚Äôs Bilaspur
content: As per preliminary information, when turpentine oil was being transferred from a tanker into jerry cans using a motor, a spark from the motor ignited one of the cans

title: Tribunal grants 6-month extension for uploading Waqf property data on UMEED portal
content: Waqf board stated that while it submitted details of all 36,000 institutions, out of nearly 75,000 Waqf properties, only 50,000 properties could be uploaded on the portal

title: Kochi mayor row: Congress leaders express differing opinions
content: While K.C. Venugopal and Ramesh Chennithala urge party members to respect the decision-making process, others such as Ajay Tharayil and Mathew Kuzhalnadan voice concerns about exclusion of two-time councillor Deepthi Mary Varghese

title: UN at 80: Ellora caves host global cultural celebration with artists from 7 nations
content: As the United Nations marks 80 years, a rare cultural celebration unfolded at the Ellora Caves in Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar. From classical and fusion performances to recreated historic concerts and heritage tours, artists and dignitaries from over 35 countries came together at the Kailasa temple to celebrate shared values of culture, spirituality, and peaceful coexistence. The event highlighted Ajanta and Ellora as India‚Äôs first UNESCO World Heritage Sites and showcased India‚Äôs living cultural heritage on a global stage.

title: Uttar Pradesh Govt recruitments: Akhilesh Yadav accuses BJP of denying OBC reservation
content: "BJP is denying one-third of the Constitutionally mandated 27% reservation for OBCs and showing its real ‚Äòanti-Constitution, anti-reservation‚Äô face," says Akhilesh Yadav

title: Libya‚Äôs Army Chief killed in Turkye jet crash
content: A private jet carrying General Muhammad Ali Ahmad al-Haddad, four officers, and three crew members crashed in Turkiye on December 23, 2025, shortly after taking off from Ankara

title: ‚ÄòI develop infections in Delhi‚Äô: Nitin Gadkari acknowledges "40% pollution" linked to transport
content: The Transport Minister further questioned the logic of spending ‚Çπ22 lakh crore annually on fossil fuel imports, calling for greater self-reliance in alternative and biofuels

title: Kerala SIR: Kozhikode North Assembly segment has highest voter exclusions in district
content: While 1,84,784 enumeration forms were distributed in the constituency, 23,709 were not returned, which is 12.83%. Political parties begin process to cross-check draft electoral roll in Kozhikode district

title: Watch: Two killed, internet suspended in Assam‚Äôs violence-hit Karbi Anglong
content: Protesters set fire to the ancestral residence of an Assam tribal council chief on December 22, 2025, accusing him of failing to evict ‚Äúoutsiders‚Äù from two categories of government-designated grazing reserves

title: Telangana likely to get relief from cold conditions soon; temperatures may not dip again till winter end in mid-February
content: There is no indication that temperatures will dip again before the winter season ends in mid-February

title: Scuffles break out between police, BJP supporters in Howrah over killing of Hindu Bangladeshi youth
content: Trouble started after police stopped a procession by the saffron party before it could reach Howrah bridge, triggering heated arguments between protesters and security personnel

title: Unnao rape survivor to move Supreme Court against suspension of Sengar‚Äôs jail term
content: The survivor and her mother staged a protest near Mandi House against the verdict granting bail to the accused, expelled BJP leader Kuldeep Sengar

title: Theft of coffee and pepper: Kodagu police issue advisory to traders
content: Superintendent of Kodagu district police K. Ramarajan pointed to the registration of cases at various police stations about theft of harvested coffee and pepper from storage locations during the on-going harvesting period

title: V.D. Satheesan links attack on Palakkad carolers to ‚Äònorth India anti-Christian wave‚Äô, warns of communal push in Kerala
content: Satheesan joins a chorus of LDF leaders who have condemned Sangh Parivar for ‚Äòothering‚Äô Christians in Kerala

title: Minimum temperatures to fall across West Bengal: IMD
content: ‚ÄúNight temperatures in north Bengal districts will fall by two notches at a few places,‚Äù IMD said in its forecast on December 24, 2025, dry weather will prevail over all districts during next seven days,‚Äù says IMD

title: Only AMMK will decide which party to forge an alliance with: T.T.V. Dhinakaran
content: He dismissed as ‚Äúrumours‚Äù reports in a section of the media that the principal Opposition party, the AIADMK, had agreed to allocate six seats to the AMMK for the upcoming State Assembly election

title: CRPF jawan injured in leopard attack at camp in south Kashmir
content: The leopard strayed into the CRPF camp in Kapran area of Verinag in south Kashmir while personnel were having breakfast in the mess

title: T.N. CM Stalin flags off 20 multi-axle air-conditioned buses for SETC
content: The buses, procured at a cost of ‚Çπ34.30 crore, are equipped with comfortable seating arrangements for 51 passengers each, and will be operated by the Tamil Nadu Transport Department on various routes across the State

title: Former Kerala MLA and filmmaker P.T. Kunju Muhammed arrested on sexual assault charges, let out on bail
content: Police questioned Muhammed and later released him from custody in accordance with a district court order granting the director anticipatory bail and protection from arrest

title: T.N. Forest dept. curbs tourist entry at Ooty‚Äôs Thalakundha village amid onset of ground frost
content: According to Forest department officials, tourism in the area has exploded over the past week, after a number of people began posting videos and pictures online of ground frost carpeting the Thalakundha area

title: Bombay HC quashes FIR against TV channel personnel
content: In a case pertaining to a caste remark in a Marathi TV serial, the court said mere reference to caste name¬†does not constitute¬†offence without intent

title: Vande Bharat hits overturned autorickshaw near Varkala in Kerala
content: No injuries to train passengers reported. The autorickshaw was unattended and the driver was later nabbed in an intoxicated state

title: Did an ancient Vaigai flood contribute to Keezhadi‚Äôs abandonment?
content: According to new research, some urban-like structures at Keezhadi were likely buried a little over a thousand years ago ‚Äî around 1,155 years before present in scientists‚Äô phrasing ‚Äî and this burial was related to a high-energy flood event that deposited sands and then finer silts and clays on the floodplain

title: Success of LVM-3 mission reinforces India's growing role in global commercial launch market: PM Modi
content: "A significant stride in India's space sector. The successful LVM3-M6 launch, placing the heaviest satellite ever launched from Indian soil, the spacecraft of U.S., BlueBird Block-2, into its intended orbit, marks a proud milestone in India's space journey," says PM Modi

title: Why is government pushing through 'fatally flawed' redefinition of Aravallis, asks Congress
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh said the redefinition of the Aravallis was opposed by the Forest Survey

title: Army JCO killed in firing incident in J&K's Samba
content: The incident occurred late Tuesday (December 23) night and is under investigation, they said, ruling out any terror angle behind the shooting

title: Business events that shaped India in 2025
content: From Trump‚Äôs trade war to RBI repo rate cuts and major corporate entries, 2025 delivered several notable developments. Though not all were transformational, a few deserve closer attention.

title: Telangana DCA busts unlicensed medical device manufacturing unit; dialysis kits, sterile eye drapes found at site
content: The company was manufacturing Risk Class B medical devices - which are low-to-moderate risk healthcare products that come into direct contact with patients and therefore require strict quality control

title: Protests erupt after RSS-BJP man‚Äôs alleged attack on children‚Äôs Christmas carol group in Kerala‚Äôs Palakkad
content: RSS-BJP worker Aswin Raj allegedly assaulted the children and damaged their musical instrument. The police have arrested him

title: Avalanche warning issued for five districts in J&K
content: The low danger avalanche warning has been issued for Doda, Ganderbal, Kishtwar, Poonch and Ramban districts

title: Two militants among six arrested in Manipur
content: ‚ÄúOne active cadre of the banned Prepak (G-5) was apprehended from Keibi Heikak Mapan in Imphal East district on Tuesday (December 24, 2025),‚Äù says a police statement

title: Internal dissent within Congress over selection of Kochi mayor candidate intensifies
content: KPCC general secretary and two-time councillor Deepthi Mary Varghese alleges selection process ‚Äòdiscrepancies‚Äô

title: NCP leader kidnapped, assaulted over financial dispute in Nanded district; seven held
content: Jeevan Ghogare, former leader of opposition in Nanded Municipal Corporation, has accused MLA Prataprao Chikhalikar, who represents the Loha Assembly seat in the district, of orchestrating the attack

title: Rooftop solar plants commissioned at 148 stations across South Western Railway
content: Major stations equipped with rooftop solar facilities include Krantiveera Sangolli Rayanna (KSR) Bengaluru Railway Station at Majestic, Hubballi, Mysuru, Dharwad, Belagavi, Hosapete, Gadag and Ballari.

title: Girl 'raped and murdered' in Odisha‚Äôs Bhadrak; locals stage protest
content: Local people staged a road blockade at Baligaon on Tuesday night, demanding immediate arrest of those involved in the crime

title: How Indian States are following a pro-incumbency trend
content: Examples from around the world indicate how structural pressures, economic strain, social churn, and an anti-elite sentiment are producing different electoral logics.  But in India‚Äôs States, governments have got re-elected, often through welfare-driven incumbencies

title: Internet suspended in Assam‚Äôs Karbi Anglong, West Karbi Anglong amid unrest
content: The notification stated that the Government of Assam received reports from the District Magistrates of Karbi Anglong and West Karbi Anglong on December 23 of a serious "law and order" situation in two districts

title: Bengal Governor orders inquiry into firing of starter gun at marathon run in Kolkata
content: It also noted that minor splinters or particle-like fragments were emitted from the starter gun upon firing, but confirmed that no injury was caused to the Governor or anyone else present at the venue.

title: India tops global doping list for third consecutive year | Data
content: Global comparisons show that despite more rigorous testing regimes, the doping rate is much lower in many other countries

title: ‚ÄòBiggest fugitives‚Äô Lalit Modi, Vijay Mallya captured on London party video
content: ‚ÄúWe are the two fugitives, the biggest fugitives of India,‚Äù Lalit Modi, the founding commissioner of the Indian Premier League (IPL), can be heard saying in the video.

title: The struggle to have a memorial after Ambedkar in Chennai
content: During then Chief Minister M. Karunanidhi‚Äôs stint as CM of the State, he got an arts and science college in Vyasarpadi in north Chennai named after Ambedkar

title: How T.N. Seshan‚Äôs airport arrival led to standoff with Jayalalithaa and attack on a star hotel
content: In the morning on November 27, 1994, the then Chief Election Commissioner of India T.N. Seshan landed at Madras Airport from New Delhi. What should have been a routine arrival quickly turned into a standoff with Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

title: VP Radhakrishnan welcomes AI in school curricula, says India should take lead
content: Vice President C.P. Radhakrishnan said on Tuesday that artificial intelligence should be incorporated into school curricula, and that India should be striving to reach the top of the field

title: Vizag will become data centre hub and Amaravati quantum hub says Naidu
content: Chief Minister highlights Visakhapatnam‚Äôs strong subsea cable connectivity and digital infrastructure which are positioning it as a key node in the global data ecosystem; Tirupati is being developed as a Space City, while regions such as Anantapur and Kadapa will evolve into major electronics and aerospace hubs, he adds

title: Bombay HC directs Maharashtra govt to pay ‚Çπ50 lakh benefit to COVID duty staff‚Äôs family
content: The court invokes societal gratitude for frontline workers, calls for generous interpretation of¬†schemes¬†to provide tangible relief to families who suffered immense hardships during the pandemic

title: Record rise in admissions to private schools under RTE in U.P., says govt.
content: Over the last five years, the total number of students securing admission to private schools under the scheme has more than doubled, a statement said

title: Intensified drunk driving checks in Hyderabad from December 24; SHE Teams in plain clothes to monitor crowded areas, party venues
content: Hyderabad CP says riders/motorists caught drunk will face vehicle seizure, a fine of ‚Çπ10,000, six-month jail term and even permanent cancellation of driving licences

title: Deepthy Mary Varghese voices displeasure over being overlooked for Mayor‚Äôs post
content: KPCC general secretary and two-time Corporation councillor questions selection process, alleges norms were bypassed as District Congress Committee announced candidates for split terms

title: J&K HC dismisses Mehbooba‚Äôs PIL on undertrials; says courts cannot serve as forums for electoral campaigns
content: The court said that the PIL was grounded in ambiguity and rested on incomplete, vague and unsubstantiated assertions. The jurisdiction of PIL could not be invoked based on generalised claims without naming affected persons, challenging specific orders or placing verifiable material on record

title: Bombay HC rejects bail pleas of four accused in Palghar lynching case, cites gravity of roles
content: The court said¬†liberty ‚Äúcannot be absolute in every¬†situation‚Äù;¬†directs CBI to complete¬†probe swiftly as applicants¬†remain¬†in custody for over five¬†years

title: Leh violence: 22 officials, including CRPF, Ladakh Police personnel, record statement before Judicial Commission
content: An official spokesman said the Commission has ‚Äúalready collected and examined the written proceedings and statements submitted earlier as part of the preliminary process‚Äù

title: Over 27 lakh voters deleted from Chhattisgarh draft roll after SIR
content: The release added that genuine voters can still be added back in electoral roll during the Claims and Objections phase

title: 95 lakh names deleted from rolls of three States, one UT
content: The voters whose names have been deleted can apply for re-inclusion. The electoral officers will take a final decision on the applications, and the final rolls will be issued on February 14

title: 22 CPI (Maoist) cadres surrender in Odisha
content: They carried collective bounty of ‚Çπ1.84 crore on their heads; Odisha Police say they will be given subsidised housing, health plans and other welfare provisions to facilitate their mainstreaming

title: Clayton Kershaw and wife welcome fifth baby, Chloe Peach
content: the former los Angeles Dodgers pitcher announced he will retire at the end of the 2025 season . he shared a post with his new daughter, Chloe Peach Kershaw, alongside his wife and four children . the three-time world series champion announced during an interview on the "Sunday Night Baseball" broadcast on June 15 .

title: The budding Spurs-Thunder rivalry that could shape the future of the West
content: wemby believes he's the best overall player in the league . the defending champions had snapped their 16-game winning streak in the most high-stakes game of the season . wembanyama has had a frosty competitive relationship with 'chet Holmgren' .

title: Inside the twists and turns of Penn State's 58-day coaching search
content: Matt Campbell is new coach for the first time in 58 days as head coach . the 46-year-old had become Iowa State's all-time coaching wins leader . he had spent much of his childhood following Nittany Lions football while visiting grandparents .

title: Power Rankings: Kentucky, Seton Hall crack top 25
content: Kentucky dropped out of these Power Rankings back on Dec. 4 . the Wildcats lost by 35 points to Gonzaga in Nashville on tuesday . a complete roster looks very much like a top-25 team, if the second half is any indication .

title: We made score picks for every postseason CFB game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .

title: NFL playoff-clinching scenarios: What's at stake for nine teams in Week 17?
content: eight more teams punched their ticket into the postseason during week 16 of 2025 . 10 of 14 teams have qualified for the playoffs with two weeks to go . five AFC teams and four NFC teams have a chance to secure something this week .

title: Which of these eight midfield targets fits best at Man United?
content: the need for a new midfield partner in the center of Ruben Amorim's midfield is more pressing than ever . the midfielder's recent comments suggest that united may even have two midfield roles to fill soon . however, sources say at least seven midfielders were under consideration .

title: Metcalf's 2-game ban upheld, will forfeit $555K
content: dK Metcalf will sit out the final two games of the regular season . he will forfeit $555,556 in salary . the suspension also voids $45 million in future guaranteed money, according to his contract .

title: Wait, no Jordan Love? The biggest Pro Bowl snubs for the AFC and NFC rosters
content: there are always a few standout players who should make the Pro Bowl . the snubs aren't named to the initial AFC and NFC rosters . a handful of players may be disappointed to not make the AFC or NFC teams .

title: 2026 NFL Pro Bowl AFC, NFC rosters: The league's top players
content: the rosters are set for the 2026 NFL Pro Bowl Games . the Baltimore Ravens, Denver Broncos , San Francisco 49ers and Seattle Seahawks lead the way with each having six players chosen . this year's games include a skills competition and a 7-on-7 flag football game scheduled for Feb. 3 .
